ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Kubert,Howard Chaykin,Romeo Tanghal,Alex Niño,Bill Draut,Fred Hembeck
ComicInfo.Title: The Phantom with My Face!; The Soldiers from "Heaven!"; Atrocities!
ComicInfo.Summary: Major Preston was a man who thrived on war. He is accidentally placed in suspended animation for centuries. When he awakens, he avoids mad mutants, then finds a city protected by a force field. The inhabitants of the city say he is infected by the same plague that the mutants have, and they place him in a prison cell. He is to be isolated for the rest of his life so that the plague doesn't spread. The plague's name is violence.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Scott Edelman,Jack Oleck,Arnold Drake,Jack C. Harris,Fred Hembeck
